note:
An interested inhabitant of the globe - trying to keep somewhat informed. I dabble in #boatbuilding .

https://www.flickr.com/photos/jdory/

#alaska

"A man who is not afraid of the sea will soon be drowned, he said, for he will be going out on a day he shouldn't. But we do be afraid of the sea, and we do only be drownded now and again." John Millington Synge

Blue and slapping run the waves
ebbing out or flowing
Let us go to life!... or graves,
but let's at least be going" - John Masefield

fields.name: Avatar
fields.value: I run a community email list. I&#39;ve had to ban rule breakers - so I&#39;ve been called the anti-christ, a nazi, king, and more. Avatar is a fairy holding a wand and sign of chest says: &quot;Don&#39;t make me banish you&quot;.

fields.name: Banner
fields.value: Head shot of self with Carol behind as we hiked in Seward.
